text: A maa gbe iwe ise eda kale (fun won). Nigba naa, o maa ri awon elese ti won yoo maa beru nipa ohun ti n be ninu iwe ise won. Won yoo wi pe: “Egbe wa! Iru iwe wo ni eyi na; ko fi ohun kekere ati nla kan sile lai ko o sile?” Won si ba ohun ti won se nise nibe. Oluwa re ko si nii sabosi si eni kan
